title: Mastering Science Concepts Through Animation: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Modular learning in 5-10 minute increments accessible via smartphones, focusing on science concepts requiring dynamic visualization such as experimental processes/molecular structures.

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex scientific phenomena with over 80% accuracy using animation-based materials
Through materials combining system-pacing animations and audio narration, learners reproduce spatiotemporal changes in scientific concepts with 90% accuracy
After animation-based learning, learners achieve 25% higher performance in summative assessments compared to those using static graphics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
